## Subject.subscribe() method

Subscribes to subject updates.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
subscribe(subscription: Subscription<T>): () => void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  subscription | <code>Subscription&lt;T&gt;</code> | Callback that will receive Subject values. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`() => void`
